name: TransactV3PendingToRetryableOkTests
description: Transact V3 Pending To Retryable Ok test
descriptionHtml: Transact V3 Pending To Retryable Ok test

testStage.description: Transact V3 Pending To Retryable Ok test

steps.name: Transact V3 Pending To Retryable Ok
Action Test Step 1 : Set Vendor simulator to fail (MTNNG EXCEPTION)
Action Test Step 2 : Wait 5 seconds for simulator to run
Action Test Step 3 : Execute Fin Terms Calculate REST Request
Action Test Step 4 : Execute Transact V3 REST Request
Action Test Step 5 : Set Vendor simulator to SUCCESS
Action Test Step 6 :  Wait 20 seconds for simulator to run and data processing to complete
Step.1 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field exists (not empty)
Step.2 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field exists (not null)
Step.3 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field is correct
Step.4 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate productId field is correct
Step.5 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate purchaseAmount field is correct
Step.6 --> Transact V3 REST response assertions --> Validate responseCode field is correct
Step.7 --> Transact V3 REST response assertions --> Validate responseMessage field is correct
Step.8 --> Transact V3 REST response assertions --> Validate raasTxnRef field exists
Step.9 --> Transact V3 REST response assertions --> Validate HTTPResponseCode field exists
Action Test Step 7 : Wait 20 seconds before executing CTX DB assertions
